description: Unique identifier for the user. Generated at registration and immutable.
usage: Include in all events where user can be identified.

description: User's email address.
usage: Include when email context is relevant.

description: Timestamp when the user account was created.
usage: Track account age for cohort analysis.

description: Current subscription tier of the user.
usage: Segment analysis by subscription level.

constraints: enum: email, google, facebook, apple, github
description: Method used to register an account.
usage: Track registration source for conversion analysis.

description: Six-character alphanumeric referral code.
usage: Track referral program effectiveness.

description: Type of account created.
usage: Segment users by account type.

description: How the user verified their email.
usage: Analyze verification preferences.

description: Seconds between registration and email verification.
usage: Measure verification funnel speed.

constraints: enum: mobile, tablet, desktop, tv, watch
description: Type of device being used.
usage: Include in device_info group for platform-specific analysis.

constraints: enum: web, ios, android, windows, macos, linux
description: Platform or operating system.
usage: Critical for cross-platform analysis.

description: Operating system version string.
usage: Track OS-specific issues and feature adoption.

description: Application version in semver format.
usage: Track feature rollout and bug reports by version.

description: Unique identifier for the user session.
usage: Group events within a single user session.

description: Timestamp when the session began.
usage: Calculate session duration and time-based analysis.

description: Total number of sessions for this user.
usage: Track user engagement over time.

description: Full URL of the current page.
usage: Track page-level engagement and navigation paths.

description: Title of the current page.
usage: Human-readable page identification.

description: URL of the referring page.
usage: Track traffic sources and user journeys.

description: Version identifier for the onboarding flow.
usage: A/B test different onboarding experiences.

description: Name of the onboarding step completed.
usage: Track onboarding funnel progression.

description: Numeric position of the step in the flow.
usage: Order steps for funnel analysis.

description: Whether the user skipped this step.
usage: Identify commonly skipped steps.

description: Seconds spent on this step.
usage: Identify slow or confusing steps.

description: Total number of steps in the onboarding flow.
usage: Calculate completion percentage.

description: Number of steps the user completed.
usage: Track partial completions.

description: Unique identifier for the project.
usage: Track project-level analytics and cross-reference events.

description: Name of the project.
usage: Human-readable project identification.

description: Template used to create the project.
usage: Analyze template popularity and user preferences.

description: Email address of the invited collaborator.
usage: Track invitation patterns and collaboration growth.

description: Permission level granted to the collaborator.
usage: Analyze permission distribution and security patterns.

description: MIME type or extension of the uploaded file.
usage: Track file type distribution for storage optimization.

description: Size of the uploaded file in bytes.
usage: Monitor storage usage and identify large uploads.
